item.title: Home 8
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Smart Thermometer Help prevent
spreading your illness Shop Now Introducing The Hosttest Thermometer.

Easier way to take temperature

Thermo is a game changer. Now, a fast, simple, no-contact gesture yields medical-grade results right on the device and provides an automatic sync with the free Thermo app, available for iOS and Android. Features.

The coolest technology

Power-on in second

One tap to wake up the device in 1 second.

Highly accurate

16 infrared sensors take over 4,000 measurements—a revolutionary advancement

Check on LED display

Check the result on a fancy and clear LED display.

Auto turn-off

Check the result on LED display, and put device aside for automatically power-off.

2 ways of measurement

Get a clinical-standard reading of your body temperature in less than 1 second by a slightly and friendly touch on the forehead. Both 2 ways measurement are accurate.

Track your body temperature

Each measurement results can be synchronized to the App of the corresponding family member. The trend of temperature changes at each time, day, month, and year can be seen at a glance.

Batteries last up to 2 years

Now, a fast, simple, no-contact gesture yields medical-grade results right on the device and provides an automatic sync with the free Thermo app.

Easy to use

The full chamfer probe with the extra soften process offers a most comfortable contact with the babies.
  • Automatic synchronization
  • Support more than 500 users
  • Compact and portable
  • No contact required
  • Know when it's time to take action
Reviews

What customers say

A great watch with lots of great features. Easy to make phone calls and send text messages. Also, makes it easy to keep track of where your child is with its location settings. Tracey L., New York I'm good to go. You won't regret it. Not able to tell you how happy I am with kid smartwatch. I have gotten at least 50 times the value from kid smartwatch. Fox X., New York Thanks to kid smartwatch, we've just launched our 5th website! I couldn't have asked for more than this. Kid smartwatch is the most valuable business resource we have EVER purchased. Etienne B., New York I have gotten at least 50 times the value from kid smartwatch. I just can't get enough of kid smartwatch. I want to get a T-Shirt with kid smartwatch on it so I can show it off to everyone. Javier U, New York As featured in

Buy Now

$724,47

Enormous Wool Bench

In stock

  • Free shipping from $150
  • 30-day returns
  • 2-year warranty
